name: Flerf
description:
So,

One night, I got an idea, that what if there was orbital physics in a game that has 2d flat planets like Terraria or Starbound.

Few breakdowns later, BANG! I got this.

Nothing in this is perfect and it's just an idea.

Cheers:

The amazing dino dude! - by: @ScisorMarks whos apparently moved to @ArksDigital

The cool looking spaceship! - by: @zintoki
